section.6: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: 'Do not let the Bedouin make you change the name of this prayer of yours, for they delay the prayer until it is very dark because of their preoccupation with camels and milking them. Verily, it is 'Isha
